Uses of Package
org.fcrepo.http.commons.responses

  • Packages that use org.fcrepo.http.commons.responses 
    Package Description
    org.fcrepo.http.api
    This package provides a RESTful API for several content management and core repository services.
    org.fcrepo.http.api.repository
    This package provides functionality for core repository management.
    org.fcrepo.http.api.responses  
    org.fcrepo.http.commons.responses
    Helpers and providers for different response formats.
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.http.commons.responses used by org.fcrepo.http.api 
    Class and Description
    HtmlTemplate
    An annotation that hints to the HtmlProvider a template that should be used to render a response.
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.http.commons.responses used by org.fcrepo.http.api.repository 
    Class and Description
    HtmlTemplate
    An annotation that hints to the HtmlProvider a template that should be used to render a response.
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.http.commons.responses used by org.fcrepo.http.api.responses 
    Class and Description
    BaseHtmlProvider
    A simple JAX-RS Entity Provider that can accept RDF datasets that represent Fedora resources and merge them into templates chosen based on the primary node type of the backing JCR node for that Fedora resource.
    StreamingBaseHtmlProvider
    Simple HTML provider that delegates to BaseHtmlProvider
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.http.commons.responses used by org.fcrepo.http.commons.responses 
    Class and Description
    ViewHelpers
    General view helpers for rendering HTML responses
